A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really have no idea where all the hate is coming from. The movie was fantastic! It felt like Star Wars and gave me flash backs to watching the original trilogy when I was a kid. I think people can’t handle the fact that this movie made them think\, and that it wasn’t two and half hours of pure CGI battle scenes. I guess the average American just doesn’t have the attention span to appreciate a work of art anymore.
